languages.text: {n}Вы замечаете, что взгляд механических визоров Торианы периодически стреляет мимо вас, в сторону Паскаля. Кажется, персона техножреца вызывает у нее живейший интерес.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Вы замечаете, что взгляд механических визоров Торианы периодически стреляет мимо вас, в сторону ваших великолепных трофеев. Кажется, творения нечеловеческих рас вызывают у нее живейший интерес.{/n}

languages.text: {n}You notice Toriana's mechanical visors periodically looking past you, in the direction of Pasqal. It seems the Tech-Priest is an object of fascination for her.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Вы замечаете, что взгляд механических визоров Торианы периодически стреляет мимо вас, в сторону Паскаля. Кажется, персона техножреца вызывает у нее живейший интерес.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}You notice Toriana's mechanical visors glancing past you, in the direction of your glorious trophies. She must be fascinated by works of inhuman races.{/n}
{n}You notice Toriana's mechanical visors glancing past you, in the direction of your glorious trophies. She must be fascinated by works of inhuman races.{/n}
{n}You notice Toriana's mechanical visors periodically looking past you, in the direction of Pasqal. It seems the Tech-Priest is an object of fascination for her.{/n}
{n}You notice Toriana's mechanical visors periodically looking past you, in the direction of Pasqal. It seems the Tech-Priest is an object of fascination for her.{/n}
{n}You notice Toriana's mechanical visors periodically looking past you, in the direction of Pasqal. It seems the Tech-Priest is an object of fascination for her.{/n}

languages.text: {n}トリアーナの機械面が断続的にあなたの後、パスカルの方を見ていることに気づく。技術司祭はトリアーナにとって興味の対象らしい。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You notice Toriana's mechanical visors periodically looking past you, in the direction of Pasqal. It seems the Tech-Priest is an object of fascination for her.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}トリアーナの機械面が断続的にあなたの後、パスカルの方を見ていることに気づく。技術司祭はトリアーナにとって興味の対象らしい。{/n}

languages.text: {n}你注意到，托丽安娜的机械面甲时不时越过你，望向帕斯卡的方向。看来，那位技术神甫让她相当着迷。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You notice Toriana's mechanical visors periodically looking past you, in the direction of Pasqal. It seems the Tech-Priest is an object of fascination for her.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你注意到，托丽安娜的机械面甲时不时越过你，望向帕斯卡的方向。看来，那位技术祭司让她相当着迷。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Adviertes que los visores mecánicos de Toriana te traspasan de vez en cuando, en dirección a Pasqal. Parece que siente fascinación por dicho tecnosacerdote.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You notice Toriana's mechanical visors periodically looking past you, in the direction of Pasqal. It seems the Tech-Priest is an object of fascination for her.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Adviertes que los visores mecánicos de Toriana te traspasan de vez en cuando, en dirección a Pasqal. Parece que siente fascinación por dicho tecnosacerdote.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vous remarquez que les visières mécaniques de Toriana ne cessent de regarder par-dessus votre épaule en direction de Pasqal. Elle semble tout bonnement fascinée par le technoprêtre.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You notice Toriana's mechanical visors periodically looking past you, in the direction of Pasqal. It seems the Tech-Priest is an object of fascination for her.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous remarquez que les visières mécaniques de Toriana ne cessent de regarder par-dessus votre épaule en direction de Pasqal. Elle semble tout bonnement fascinée par le technoprêtre.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Du bemerkst, dass Torianas mechanische Visoren immer wieder an dir vorbeiblicken, in Richtung Pasqal. Irgendetwas an dem Techpriester scheint sie zu faszinieren.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You notice Toriana's mechanical visors periodically looking past you, in the direction of Pasqal. It seems the Tech-Priest is an object of fascination for her.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Du bemerkst, dass Torianas mechanische Visoren immer wieder an dir vorbeiblicken, in Richtung Pasqal. Irgendetwas an dem Techpriester scheint sie zu faszinieren.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Toriana'nın mekanik vizörlerinin zaman zaman arkana, Pasqal'a doğru baktığını fark ediyorsun. Görünüşe bakılırsa Tekno Rahip, Toriana'nın ilgisini çekmiş.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You notice Toriana's mechanical visors periodically looking past you, in the direction of Pasqal. It seems the Tech-Priest is an object of fascination for her.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Toriana'nın mekanik vizörlerinin zaman zaman arkana, Pasqal'a doğru baktığını fark ediyorsun. Görünüşe bakılırsa Tekno Rahip, Toriana'nın ilgisini çekmiş.{/n}
